title: Looking for a coach to help me get out of Bronze to silver 5
body: Hey everyone. Looking for a coach to give me advice to improve me as a player and my overall skills and mechanics in league of legends to help me climb from B3 to S5 in the next few weeks. My in game name is WilliK and im on OCE and have a mic and discord. Ill listen to advice and just want to get better so i can climb on my own without advice later this year.

replies.body: Hey WilliK,  getting from B3 to S5 is pretty easy and ive helped friends and randoms climb bronze many times so if you add me in game i can show you how to get to s5 as fast as possible! My in game name is Plebanon :)
dont get 2 silver trust me no bodys is gud there people in vronze r less salty and better no joke

I'm happy to help you with Jungle and Adc add me ingame
1t 1t 1t 1t 1t
